name: fdm_bbl_3dp_002_common
extruder_variant_list: Direct Drive Standard,Direct Drive High Flow
Direct Drive Standard,Direct Drive High Flow
machine_end_gcode:
;===== date: 20230428 =====================
M400 ; wait for buffer to clear
G92 E0 ; zero the extruder
G1 E-0.8 F1800 ; retract
G1 Z{max_layer_z + 0.5} F900 ; lower z a little
G1 X65 Y245 F12000 ; move to safe pos 
G1 Y265 F3000

G1 X65 Y245 F12000
G1 Y265 F3000
M140 S0 ; turn off bed
M106 S0 ; turn off fan
M106 P2 S0 ; turn off remote part cooling fan
M106 P3 S0 ; turn off chamber cooling fan

G1 X100 F12000 ; wipe
; pull back filament to AMS
M620 S255
G1 X20 Y50 F12000
G1 Y-3
T255
G1 X65 F12000
G1 Y265
G1 X100 F12000 ; wipe
M621 S255
M104 S0 ; turn off hotend

M622.1 S1 ; for prev firware, default turned on
M1002 judge_flag timelapse_record_flag
M622 J1
    M400 ; wait all motion done
    M991 S0 P-1 ;end smooth timelapse at safe pos
    M400 S3 ;wait for last picture to be taken
M623; end of "timelapse_record_flag"

M400 ; wait all motion done
M17 S
M17 Z0.4 ; lower z motor current to reduce impact if there is something in the bottom
{if (max_layer_z + 100.0) < 250}
    G1 Z{max_layer_z + 100.0} F600
    G1 Z{max_layer_z +98.0}
{else}
    G1 Z250 F600
    G1 Z248
{endif}
M400 P100
M17 R ; restore z current

G90
G1 X128 Y250 F3600

M220 S100  ; Reset feedrate magnitude
M201.2 K1.0 ; Reset acc magnitude
M73.2   R1.0 ;Reset left time magnitude
M1002 set_gcode_claim_speed_level : 0

M17 X0.8 Y0.8 Z0.5 ; lower motor current to 45% power
layer_change_gcode:
; layer num/total_layer_count: {layer_num+1}/[total_layer_count]
; update layer progress
M73 L{layer_num+1}
M991 S0 P{layer_num} ;notify layer change
time_lapse_gcode:
;========Date 20250206========
M622.1 S1 ; for prev firware, default turned on
M1002 judge_flag timelapse_record_flag
M622 J1
{if timelapse_type == 0} ; timelapse without wipe tower
M971 S11 C10 O0 T3000
{elsif timelapse_type == 1} ; timelapse with wipe tower
G92 E0
G1 X65 Y245 F20000 ; move to safe pos
G17
G2 Z{layer_z} I0.86 J0.86 P1 F20000
G1 Y265 F3000
M400 P300
M971 S11 C10 O0 T3000
G92 E0
G1 X100 F5000
G1 Y255 F20000
{endif}
M623
change_filament_gcode:
M620 S[next_extruder]A
M204 S9000
G1 Z{max_layer_z + 8.0} F1200

M400
M106 P1 S0
M106 P2 S0
{if old_filament_temp > 142 && next_extruder < 255}
M104 S[old_filament_temp]
{endif}
{if toolchange_count == 2}
; get travel path for change filament
;M620.1 X[travel_point_1_x] Y[travel_point_1_y] F21000 P0
;M620.1 X[travel_point_2_x] Y[travel_point_2_y] F21000 P1
;M620.1 X[travel_point_3_x] Y[travel_point_3_y] F21000 P2
{endif}

M620.10 A0 F[old_filament_e_feedrate] L[flush_length] H{nozzle_diameter[previous_extruder]} T{nozzle_temperature_range_high[previous_extruder]} P[old_filament_temp]
M620.10 A1 F[new_filament_e_feedrate] L[flush_length] H{nozzle_diameter[next_extruder]} T{nozzle_temperature_range_high[next_extruder]} P[new_filament_temp]

T[next_extruder]
M400
M83
{if next_extruder < 255}

M628 S0

{if flush_length_1 > 1}
; FLUSH_START
; always use highest temperature to flush
M400
M1002 set_filament_type:UNKNOWN
M109 S[nozzle_temperature_range_high]
{if flush_length_1 > 23.7}
G1 E23.7 F{old_filament_e_feedrate} ; do not need pulsatile flushing for start part
G1 E{(flush_length_1 - 23.7) * 0.02} F50
G1 E{(flush_length_1 - 23.7) * 0.23} F{old_filament_e_feedrate}
G1 E{(flush_length_1 - 23.7) * 0.02} F50
G1 E{(flush_length_1 - 23.7) * 0.23} F{new_filament_e_feedrate}
G1 E{(flush_length_1 - 23.7) * 0.02} F50
G1 E{(flush_length_1 - 23.7) * 0.23} F{new_filament_e_feedrate}
G1 E{(flush_length_1 - 23.7) * 0.02} F50
G1 E{(flush_length_1 - 23.7) * 0.23} F{new_filament_e_feedrate}
{else}
G1 E{flush_length_1} F{old_filament_e_feedrate}
{endif}
; FLUSH_END
G1 E-[old_retract_length_toolchange] F1800
G1 E[old_retract_length_toolchange] F300
M400
M1002 set_filament_type:{filament_type[next_extruder]}
{endif}

{if flush_length_1 > 45 && flush_length_2 > 1}
; WIPE
M400
M106 P1 S255
M400 S3
G1 Y327.6 F20000
G1 Y336 F9000
G1 Y327.6 F20000
G1 Y336 F9000
M400
M106 P1 S0
{endif}

{if flush_length_2 > 1}
; FLUSH_START
G1 E{flush_length_2 * 0.18} F{new_filament_e_feedrate}
G1 E{flush_length_2 * 0.02} F50
G1 E{flush_length_2 * 0.18} F{new_filament_e_feedrate}
G1 E{flush_length_2 * 0.02} F50
G1 E{flush_length_2 * 0.18} F{new_filament_e_feedrate}
G1 E{flush_length_2 * 0.02} F50
G1 E{flush_length_2 * 0.18} F{new_filament_e_feedrate}
G1 E{flush_length_2 * 0.02} F50
G1 E{flush_length_2 * 0.18} F{new_filament_e_feedrate}
G1 E{flush_length_2 * 0.02} F50
; FLUSH_END
G1 E-[new_retract_length_toolchange] F1800
G1 E[new_retract_length_toolchange] F300
{endif}

{if flush_length_2 > 45 && flush_length_3 > 1}
; WIPE
M400
M106 P1 S255
M400 S3
G1 Y327.6 F20000
G1 Y336 F9000
G1 Y327.6 F20000
G1 Y336 F9000
M400
M106 P1 S0
{endif}

{if flush_length_3 > 1}

; FLUSH_START
G1 E{flush_length_3 * 0.18} F{new_filament_e_feedrate}
G1 E{flush_length_3 * 0.02} F50
G1 E{flush_length_3 * 0.18} F{new_filament_e_feedrate}
G1 E{flush_length_3 * 0.02} F50
G1 E{flush_length_3 * 0.18} F{new_filament_e_feedrate}
G1 E{flush_length_3 * 0.02} F50
G1 E{flush_length_3 * 0.18} F{new_filament_e_feedrate}
G1 E{flush_length_3 * 0.02} F50
G1 E{flush_length_3 * 0.18} F{new_filament_e_feedrate}
G1 E{flush_length_3 * 0.02} F50
; FLUSH_END
G1 E-[new_retract_length_toolchange] F1800
G1 E[new_retract_length_toolchange] F300
{endif}

{if flush_length_3 > 45 && flush_length_4 > 1}
; WIPE
M400
M106 P1 S255
M400 S3
G1 Y327.6 F20000
G1 Y336 F9000
G1 Y327.6 F20000
G1 Y336 F9000
M400
M106 P1 S0
{endif}

{if flush_length_4 > 1}
; FLUSH_START
G1 E{flush_length_4 * 0.18} F{new_filament_e_feedrate}
G1 E{flush_length_4 * 0.02} F50
G1 E{flush_length_4 * 0.18} F{new_filament_e_feedrate}
G1 E{flush_length_4 * 0.02} F50
G1 E{flush_length_4 * 0.18} F{new_filament_e_feedrate}
G1 E{flush_length_4 * 0.02} F50
G1 E{flush_length_4 * 0.18} F{new_filament_e_feedrate}
G1 E{flush_length_4 * 0.02} F50
G1 E{flush_length_4 * 0.18} F{new_filament_e_feedrate}
G1 E{flush_length_4 * 0.02} F50
; FLUSH_END
{endif}

M400
M109 S[new_filament_temp]
G1 E2 F60 ;Compensate for filament spillage during waiting temperature

M400
G92 E0
G1 E-[new_retract_length_toolchange] F1800
M400
M106 P1 S255
M400 S3
G1 Y327.6 F20000
G1 Y336 F9000
G1 Y327.6 F20000
G1 Y336 F9000
G1 Y327.6 F20000
M400
M106 P1 S0

M629

M400
{else}
G1 X[x_after_toolchange] Y[y_after_toolchange] Z[z_after_toolchange] F12000
{endif}
M400
M83
G1 Y295 F30000
G1 Y265 F18000
{if layer_z <= (initial_layer_print_height + 0.001)}
M204 S[initial_layer_acceleration]
{else}
M204 S[default_acceleration]
{endif}
M621 S[next_extruder]A
G1 Z{max_layer_z + 3.0} F3000
